EmailTemplate.name: 2019.11. 21 - FedGov - Catalogue Survey.FedGov Email - Catalogue Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Help Us. Help You.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/GTFEDGOV?cmp=EBFGCATALOGUESURVEYEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, Thanks for being a loyal Grand & Toy customer.
Did you receive a 2018/2019 printed Grand & Toy catalogue? Even if you didn’t, we’d love to hear from you. Take our survey to let us know what you think, every response helps make our resources the best they can be.
It should only take a few short minutes of your time to complete.
Thanks in advance. Give Your Feedback <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/GTFEDGOV?cmp=EBFGCATALOGUESURVEYEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-511-4534
